briefTitle: Atrial Fibrillation Clopidogrel Trial With Irbesartan for Prevention of Vascular Events (ACTIVE A)

outcomeMeasures.title: First Occurence of Any Component of the Composite of Stroke, Non-Central Nervous System (Non-CNS) Systemic Embolism, Myocardial Infarction or Vascular Death as Per Adjudication
outcomeMeasures.description:
The primary event is the first occurence of any adjudicated component of the following cluster over the duration of follow-up :

* stroke (nonfatal or fatal)
* myocardial infarction (nonfatal or fatal)
* non-CNS systemic embolism
* vascular death

The primary efficacy analysis is performed on the time from randomization to this primary event. Numbers of patients with the composite event over the duration of the follow-up are presented by arm group.

outcomeMeasures.title: Occurrence of Stroke
outcomeMeasures.description: The event is the occurence of stroke (nonfatal or fatal, ischemic, hemorrhagic or of uncertain type) after validation of the Event Adjudication Committee . The analysis is performed on the time from randomization to the occurrence of this event. Numbers of patients with the event over the duration of the follow-up are presented by arm group.

outcomeMeasures.title: Death From Any Cause (Cardiovascular and Noncardiovascular)
outcomeMeasures.description: The considered event is death from any cause. The analysis is performed on the time from randomization to this event. Numbers of patients with the event over the duration of the follow-up are presented by arm group.

outcomeMeasures.title: Adjudicated Major Bleedings
outcomeMeasures.description: The number of participants with at least one major bleeding, validated by the Event Adjudication Committee are counted over the duration of the follow-up (including after permanent discontinuation of the study drug).
